name: Tmnt arcade hd remaster
description:
Hello everyone! My name is Rafael, (rafachan for you ;)). Do you remember this wonderful game? When I was a kid, I was totally in love with it, and, well... As you can see, the love story continues ^^´´

This humble remaster tries to be 100% faithful to the original, although, the first step to create it was 4 years ago, the total development time, is about 8 or 9 months (5/6 hours a day). My wish is to the full game, 100% clone, but, it still not.

I hope you enjoy the game and follow his evolution. Thank you for playing! :)

PD: If you are a graphics artis and whant to help me to restore backgrounds, please, contact me here or go @turtlesarcade and add me. Your name will be in the game,  thank you very much. 

rafachan
